analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
analyzed: na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cattāri

original: Nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
analyzed: na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cattāri

original: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cattāri
